Articles.Content:
So basically, after a very, very long time of testing and learning AND helping others how to make planets as well as giving ideas for people, I feel confident enough that I should release my first planet pack. I call it....

THE ADDITIONALS

So what this planet pack will do is Get rid of every stock planet except for The Sun and Kerbin. Those two will be completely left alone. Instead, all the removed stock bodies will be replaced with 25 New bodies including 3 Gas giants, 8 Rocky Bodies, 7 Icy Bodies, 2 Titan-like bodies, 1 Terra-like Body, 1 Oceania AND 3 COMETS! 

Currently, The mod is still under Planning stage although I have started development of the gas planets.

 

YES, I know about the age-old rule: No Pics, No Clicks. Pictures will come soon. As for now, Let me just say one of the Gas giants looks marvellous for where it will be placed. The only Pic for now. I think you will think this planet is the Hottest...
 



I will also put down a Progress Percentage to show you how much of the mod is completed.

Progress: 1%

Edited January 3, 2017 by SAS123
Added Sneak Peek Image
Looks pretty sweet! If there's any way I can help just let me know! (Donate maps and stuff)
